channel.title: Earful Productions
channel.description:
Earful pulls upon the experience of our sister company Eyeful Presentations to engage business audiences in the world in a completely different way.
It's about taking your message and making it work harder. It may start off life as an Elevator Pitch, a PowerPoint deck or Press Release...it doesn't really matter.
We'll grab hold of it, understand it, challenge it and then bring it to life through beautifully produced Podcasts, multimedia presentations and web content.
The end result? Your audience engaged with your message in a way your competition hadn’t quite considered. We think that’s rather powerful.
www.earfulproductions.co.uk
channel.itunes:subtitle: In today's busy, non-stop business world, you need to use every trick in the book to get that audience. That's where Earful and the power of Podcasting comes in.
channel.itunes:author: Earful Productions

item.title: GIMA
item.description: In this GIMA testimonial podcast we hear the thoughts and reaction of GIMA members who attended a recent ‘Presentation techniques & technical PowerPoint training day’ delivered by Eyeful Presentations.
item.dc:creator: Earful Productions
item.itunes:summary: In this GIMA testimonial podcast we hear the thoughts and reaction of GIMA members who attended a recent ‘Presentation techniques & technical PowerPoint training day’ delivered by Eyeful Presentations.

item.title: itSMF UK
item.description: itSMF UK are the founding Chapter of the IT Service Management Forum. itSMF UK is the independent and internationally recognised forum for IT Service Management professionals. Podcast 2 In this podcast we speak to Matthew Burrows the president of the institute of service management and get his take on the launch of the new global initiative PRISM.
item.dc:creator: Earful Productions
item.itunes:summary:
itSMF UK are the founding Chapter of the IT Service Management Forum. itSMF UK is the independent and internationally recognised forum for IT Service Management professionals.
Podcast 2 In this podcast we speak to Matthew Burrows the president of the institute of service management and get his take on the launch of the new global initiative PRISM.

item.title: itSMF UK
item.description: itSMF UK are the founding Chapter of the IT Service Management Forum. itSMF UK is the independent and internationally recognised forum for IT Service Management professionals. Podcast 1 In this podcast we speak to the chief executive of itSMF UK Ben Clacy who introduces us to the new global initiative PRISM.
item.dc:creator: Earful Productions
item.itunes:summary:
itSMF UK are the founding Chapter of the IT Service Management Forum. itSMF UK is the independent and internationally recognised forum for IT Service Management professionals.
Podcast 1 In this podcast we speak to the chief executive of itSMF UK Ben Clacy who introduces us to the new global initiative PRISM.

item.title: Eyeful Testimonial Montage
item.description: Eyeful Presentations work with an impressive list of clients to make the most of their presentations in many different and unique ways. In this podcast hear a variety of Eyeful’s clients enlighten you on those ways and tell you why they work with the best in the presentation business.
item.dc:creator: Earful Productions
item.itunes:summary: Eyeful Presentations work with an impressive list of clients to make the most of their presentations in many different and unique ways. In this podcast hear a variety of Eyeful’s clients enlighten you on those ways and tell you why they work with the best in the presentation business.

item.title: Hook Presentation Conference Podcast
item.description: Eyeful Presentations work with an impressive list of clients to make the most of their presentations in many different and unique ways. This podcast is one of three focusing on the upcoming Hook Presentation Conference which is happening on the 25th and 26th March 2011, in Nashville, Tennessee. In this podcast find out, what Hook is, why it’s happening now and who should be going…
item.dc:creator: Earful Productions

item.title: MY PA podcast No2
item.description: In this My PA podcast we speak to Managing Director of My PA Julie Farmer, who explains just how important the client is to My PA. Find out who My PA’s clients are, where they are and even hear from one of them on why working with My PA is such a benefit. Listen on for more…
item.dc:creator: Earful Productions
item.itunes:summary:
In this My PA podcast we speak to Managing Director of My PA Julie Farmer, who explains just how important the client is to My PA.
Find out who My PA’s clients are, where they are and even hear from one of them on why working with My PA is such a benefit.
Listen on for more…

item.title: MY PA
item.description: In this introductory My PA podcast we speak to Managing Director and founder of My PA Julie Farmer as we find out about who MY PA are, what they do, how they can save you both time and money, hear a glowing report from one of their many clients and find out how they can really help your business move up a gear…
